place.name: CONEY WESTON
place.gazetteerText: WESTON-CONEY, a parish in the district of Thetford and county of Suffolk; 6 miles S of Harling-Road r. station, and 7½ SE by E of Thetford. Post town, Ixworth, under Bury-St. Edmunds. Acres, 1,341. Real property, £2,300. Pop., 254. Houses, 58. The property is much subdivided. The living is a rectory, annexed to Barningham. The church is plain. Charities, £17. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
